# thecloud_vpc (Resource)

VPC resource allows you to manage virtual private clouds.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "thecloud_vpc" "example" {
  name       = "production-vpc"
  cidr_block = "10.0.0.0/16"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the VPC.

### Optional

- `cidr_block` (String) The IPv4 CIDR block for the VPC.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the VPC.
- `status` (String) The status of the VPC.
